name: Imagine: Rescue Vet
description:
'Imagine: Vet Rescue' is a domestic and wildlife vet simulator for the Nintendo DS. It was released on October 29th, 2009, and was published by Ubisoft as part of the 'Imagine' franchise.

Play as a young vet, who has just opened his/her first animal clinic. Take care of your neighbors' domesticated pets, as well as the local exotic baby animals. Diagnose, cure, observe and heal the animals to gain your clients' confidence and respect.
